## Music

**Temengang**:

*This song explores issues of environmental degradation from the perspective of the 'Temengang', which is Kenyah for [Forest Rhinoceros Hornbill birds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rhinoceros_hornbill)*

`r embed_audio("audio/Temengang.mp3", attribute="controls")`

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', out.width='50%'}
knitr::include_graphics("images/temengang.jpg")
```
